page.title: 19INTERVIEW.
page.content: { AN INTERVIEW WITH A SHOPKEEPER Do you think Barton is making the most of itself? Definitely not.First of all the whole of Barton needs to b cleaned up.The old mill,which is unstable,should be demolished and so should the old cattle market.Plans which were made to build a supermarket should go ahead so there are more shops which would encourage people to shop in Barton. Could I have any comments you would like to make on the area,namely Castledyke South,which is adjacent to your shop.Do you agree with the council that the mill is an "eyesore"? I have personally been campaigning to have the old mill demolished .I went to the public enquiry to support demolition but nothing ever came of it.It certainly is an eyesore.
